TopicTitle: Need Help in a Rescue Mission (Carreer)

Articles.Content:
Hi! I post this here cause i'm new and I don't know exactly where to post it .

Well, the thing is that I started a new career (i'm a bit newbie) and after doing some misions, I decided to accept a Rescue Mission. I have to reach Cabdan Kerman, put him into a capsule and bring him back home. The thing is that i', at 2 meters from Cabdan, and i'm not capable to switch him.

I tried to going tracking station or to the orbit map and I can't switch him, I tried bracket keys ( [ and ] ) and does't works...

I don't know what to do, cause i'm on space at his side, and I cannot switch Cabdan to propulse him onto the vessel. My vessel is a Stayputnik driving an MkI cockpit (empty, to put Cabdan inside) and all the other things (parachutes, tanks, propulsors...)...

Mods that I have: MechJeb 2; Station Science; Tarsier SpaceTech, that's all.

I let you a capture... Please, help me, I don't know what to do ;.;:huh:... Thanks you very much guys!!

(I don't know how to add images I put 2 links, in case that one does not works)
I believe its the "C" key to switch between crafts/eva characters who are close enough to each other. <2.5km
not sure if that might be the problem, but since you mentioned it's a new career, is your Astronaut complex upgraded to the level it allows you to do EVA's ?

not sure if that might be the problem, but since you mentioned it's a new career, is your Astronaut complex upgraded to the level it allows you to do EVA's ?

Yep, I've done some EVA's before, on sub-orbital and orbital flights

I believe its the "C" key to switch between crafts/eva characters who are close enough to each other. <2.5km

C is for camera (IVA)
